section.title: Log In
section.p: You can access the MiTeam Meetings application using any of the following options:

li.p: through the MiTeam Meetings desktop application installed in your PC.
through the MiTeam Meetings web application using the URL https://meet.mitel.io.
through the Meetings menu in your MiCollab application.

section.p: After accessing the application, as a registered user, proceed to log in to the MiTeam Meetings application as follows.
In the Welcome to MiTeam Meetings page, click Sign in. The Mitel Accounts login page opens.

To log in, a user must enter the email address (specified in the account for the user) as the user name, and click Next.Â If your email address is registered with multiple customer accounts, a Multiple accounts located. Additional account information needed to proceed message is displayed and the Account ID field appears. Enter the Account ID, and click Next.

Enter the password you specified while registering your account as the password in the field provided. Click Next. See Register your MiTeam Meetings application for more details on how to register a user.

After logging in, a registered user can start a meeting, schedule a meeting, and view a list of meetings for which the user has invitations.The following image shows an example of the Home screen when a registered user logs in to the Meetings application.

section.title: Log Out
section.p: To log out of the MiTeam Meetings application, follow these steps:

ol.li: Click your avatar above the My meetings section on your Home screen. A panel opens.
Click Sign out to log out of the application.
